{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Edimax |model=EW-7479CAP |revision=(CAP1300) |series=AC1300 |asin= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |type=enterprise access point |fcc_date=09/08/2017 |fcc_id=NDD9574791704 |pcb_id=1246-010000202-50Z |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ4018 |cpu1_cspeed=710 |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=32 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=SPI |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=DDR3 |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi1_chip1_model=IPQ4018 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi2_chip1_model=IPQ4018 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8072 |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=2 |addl_chips=2.4GHz FEM;Qualcomm;QFE1922;;2; ,,, 5GHz FEM;Qualcomm;QFE1952;;2; |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, 256QAM, DFS (master), buzzer, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ip=192.168.2.2 |default_user=admin |default_pass=1234 }}
:• '''866''' Mbps - 2-stream 802.11ac device (433Mbps per stream), :• '''400''' Mbps - 2-stream 2.4GHz channel (256QAM) = '''''1300 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC1300 Wave 2 Dual-Band Ceiling-Mount PoE Access Point}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.edimax.com/edimax/merchandise/merchandise_detail/data/edimax/global/smb_access_points_ac1300/cap1300/}} {{•}} [http://www.acelink.com.tw/EW-7479CAP.html Product page] ([[Acelink]]) "1246-010000202-50Z" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. Single chip CPU/WI1/WI2 is likely a [[Qualcomm]] IPQ4018. May also be sold as the following models: * [[Edimax EW-7479CAP]], [[Edimax CAP1300]] * Office WiFi System, Office WiFi System +1 * Office 1-2-3, Office +1, Office +3 Contains a Magnetic Buzzer KWA1295B05F
